entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High 8 except plus 5 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 8 except plus 5 along parts of the coast. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 3 except plus 1 along the coast.
